com.navis.framework.portal.context

Class UserContextUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.portal.context.UserContextUtils

  • public class UserContextUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience wrappers for creating UserContext. Everyone loves single line static method calls.

    • Method Summary

      Convenience method for applications which is for global scope

      Factory method for obtaining a UserContext (preferred approach).
      static UserContext getSystemUserContext()
      UserContext used for requests when there is no user login yet such as logging in users.

    • Method Detail

      • createUserContext

        @NotNull
public static UserContext createUserContext(java.lang.Object inUserGkey,
                                                      java.lang.String inUserId,
                                                      ScopeCoordinates inScopeCoordinates)
        Factory method for obtaining a UserContext (preferred approach). Convenience wrappers.
        Parameters:
        inUserGkey - BaseUser gKey for this User
        inUserId - User's login id (for convenience, logging, etc)
        inScopeCoordinates - ScopeCoordinates (defines the scope of this user)
